Class Soldat

    • models.Personnage

extends Personnage
    A base soldier's definition.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Soldat

        public Soldat(int id,
              String nom,
              int force)
        Initialize the base Soldat object.
        Parameters:
        id - Their identifier.
        nom - Their names.
        force - Their hitting force.

    • Method Detail

      • setChef

        public void setChef(Chef chef)
             throws SourceMorteException,
                    CibleMorteException
        Sets the soldier's chef.
        Parameters:
        chef - The soldier's new chef (nullable).
        Throws:
        SourceMorteException - Happens when this character is dead, they refuse to receive a chef when dead.
        CibleMorteException - Happens when the given chef is dead (if any given), they refuse to receive a dead chef.

      • unsetChef

        public void unsetChef()
        Drops the soldier's current chef (if any). And removes themselves from chef's troop list.
